plot: A psychological drama that explores the long-term psychological impact of political persecution through the eyes of a Chilean photographer living in San Francisco.
title: Soledad Is Gone Forever
plot_es: A psychological drama that explores the long-term psychological impact of political persecution through the eyes of a Chilean photographer living in San Francisco.
plot_en: A psychological drama that explores the long-term psychological impact of political persecution through the eyes of a Chilean photographer living in San Francisco.
